publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-491# Alex Neil: Kilmarnock and Loudoun Economy—That the Parliament expresses concern at the spate of recent factory closures in Kilmarnock and Loudoun and notes the need for urgent action to be taken to deal with the deep seated problems of deprivation in Kilmarnock and Loudoun.

S1M-491# Alex Neil: Kilmarnock and Loudoun—That the Parliament expresses concern at the spate of recent factory closures in Kilmarnock and Loudoun and notes the need for urgent action to be taken to deal with the deep seated problems of deprivation in Kilmarnock and Loudoun. Supported by: Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-491# Kilmarnock and Loudoun (lodged on 2 February 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-491# Kilmarnock and Loudoun (lodged on 2 February 2000) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-491# Kilmarnock and Loudoun (lodged on 2 February 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

Supported by: Alasdair Morgan, Andrew Wilson, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh
S1M-491# Kilmarnock and Loudoun (lodged on 2 February 2000) Donald Gorrie*
